title: API Request- Living World Episode unlock

comments.author: Pat Cavit.9234
comments.body: This is unlikely, the whole point is to log in to the actual game. Sorry!

comments.author: kanarek.8025
comments.body: Sure why not.. and then we will need API for harvest all nodes in home instance right?

comments.author: mahri.8410
comments.body: Hi. It would be nice if the Guild Wars 2 API could permit unlock of Living Story content. If someone is not able to access his PC, he could use a smartphone app to unlock the episode.
